aka: 博洛尼亚歌剧院演出录像

cast.name: 胡安.迭戈.弗洛雷兹 Juan Diego Flórez

trans_title: 罗西尼 两幕歌剧《采尔米拉》
博洛尼亚歌剧院演出录像
introduction: Zelmira movie was released Sep 25, 2012 by the Decca studio. Juan Diego Florez, Kate Aldrich, and Gregory Kunde star in this 2009 Rossini Festival production of the Rossini opera conducted by Claudio Abbado and directed by Giorgio Barberio Corsetti.The Teatro Comunale di Bologna mounted this 2009 production of Gioachino Rossini's 1822 opera Zelmira. The cast includes Juan Diego Florez, Kate Aldrich, Alex Esposito and Gregory Kunde; the orchestra and chorus of the Teatro Comunale di Bologna provide musical accompaniment under the baton of Roberto Abbado; Giorgio Barberio Corsetti directs for the stage Zelmira movie.
chinese_title: 罗西尼 两幕歌剧《采尔米拉》
